product_name: Pearl Izumi Elite Barrier MTB Bike Shoe Covers
long_description: Pearl Izumi Elite Barrier MTB bike shoe covers keep your feet warm and protected when you're ripping down trails in nasty weather. Shoe covers feature 3mm of durable, insulating neoprene to keep feet warm and dry. Soft microfleece lining increases insulation; polyurethane coating boosts durability. Durable Kevlar(R) soles that spread open and rear rip-and-stick closures offer easy on and off. Tall cuffs cover skin between shoe tops and tights. Anatomic paneling offers a performance fit; reflective detailing increases visibility in low light. Pearl Izumi recommends Elite Barrier MTB bike shoe covers for mountain bike shoes.
short_description: Pearl Izumi Elite Barrier MTB bike shoe covers keep your feet warm and protected when you're ripping down trails in nasty weather.
